website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Micro G Fuel is a very versatile running shoe. Aside from road running, some wearers also found the shoe to be dependable for gym training and casual walks. Along with its lightweight construction, the shoe also provides the running enthusiasts the necessary cushioning, traction, and protection for a better running experience.
pros: Several runners were highly appreciative of the shoe’s lightweight construction
Most of the testers were satisfied with the shoe’s comfortable feel
A significant number of wearers said that the Micro G Fuel is a good-looking shoe
some received compliments on how the shoe looked
The available color schemes received positive remarks from consumers
A couple of runners who have painful foot issues mentioned that they had painless running experiences with the Under Armour Micro G Fuel
The shoe is affordable, said a few purchasers
The Micro G Fuel is a versatile shoe
not only did a few people use it for road running, but also in the gym, while biking and as a casual shoe
cons: Some customers felt that the shoe was too tight for their tastes

customer_reviews.title: Great construction. I want to purchase another pair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes as new general gym shoes and was pleasantly surprised. They fit perfectly. Normally shoes are slightly tight and take a while to conform to my foot. There was no break in time. Great construction. I want to purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Walkup

customer_reviews.title: I'm a nurse and I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have to address a concern. I'm a nurse and I LOVE these shoes. I rated these as being a bit small just because these shoes to feel a bit snug right when you put them on. I see several comments saying they run a size small. This isn't correct. These shoes run accurate to size, however, the cushion is AMAZING. If you have Wide or thick foot, I would recommend getting a size up. I have a regular foot, meaning I don't have to buy wide shoes and I love these shoes. After you wear for a couple of days the cushion wears down just a bit and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KAYLA FREEMAN

customer_reviews.title: My feet felt fine during and after
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and comfrotable. I've been wearing them to run in and recently did a 5k trail run. My feet felt fine during and after. The one thing that is a little off abut these is the sizing--they run really small. I am normally a 7, occasionally a 6.5, but had to return and get a 7.5 for the first time ever.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: not quite what I needed
customer_reviews.text: although they were my size, they were a little tight on the width. They were also heavier then I expected so my feet got tired while wearing them. I need more cushion on my feet and they were a little hard. Anyway, I asked my daughter if she wanted them and she tried them on and she said they fit her good. she is a size10. She took them off my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Raza

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable. wear them for work
customer_reviews.text: so comfortable. wear them for work, on my feet for hours. a little heavier than i expected but it's barely noticeable. I'll get them again when i need a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cutt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price for a great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and breathable. Easy to break in. Great for running and walking. Fantastic price. And wide sizes!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these and didn't realize they're men's LOL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and didn't even realize they're men's LOL True to size and very comfortable. Worth the price. I consider these to be Unisex!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Toribio

customer_reviews.title: but I like half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 36, but I like half size bigger, so I ordered 36.5, it showed up so small, it feels like 35.5, and I have to pay shipping fee to return it! So order 1 size bigger if you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoe and love them. very light weight and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contours your foot well!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m wearing these as a write this post -I love under armor kicks, also I love the way they always contour to your foot so your foot feels snug and secure as im running the streets of New York
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and light snickers! Fit as expected and arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Michel Cros

customer_reviews.title: They are not the best UR sneakers I have bought
customer_reviews.text: Solid sneaker for the gym. They are not the best UR sneakers I have bought, they are just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Carney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered by exact size, but these are sized smaller. I had to order a full size up
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Knees feel fine after 12 hours so good support there but bottoms ...
customer_reviews.text: Tight around the ankle and too snugg in the toe. Knees feel fine after 12 hours so good support there but bottoms of shoe are to firm and flat so lumbar pain is back with a vengeance!!
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Sized up
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lightweight shoe. Followed the reviews and went a half size up and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. I wear these to do cardio after my lifts. I love them! They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great fit !
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet & these have that extra !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: run narrow and small go up a size
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable, I wear a 9, needed a 9.5 or 10. they fit narrow. otherwise ok, nice
customer_reviews.author: mob

customer_reviews.title: Under Armor Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes! Work great and have good stability. Only issue is watch wet, slippery places. They do have a tendency to slip on wet surfaces,
customer_reviews.author: Diane Morris

customer_reviews.title: I am a nurse and I am constantly on my feet and these have been great
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised about how well they fit. I am a nurse and I am constantly on my feet and these have been great
customer_reviews.author: Sara McBride

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, comfort and fit of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: xgreerx

customer_reviews.title: These shoes look great, but run a little short
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great, but run a little short. I reordered 1/2 size larger & hope they will fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes! She uses them for track and cross country.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered up a half a size and that was good. Good for running around in but would not ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected due to reading the other reviews and knowing that it runs small so I ordered up a half a size and that was good. Good for running around in but would not work out in them
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat small. Very breathable!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes, but they were small. They are very breathable, will order again, just in a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... time I am sent a shoe that looks nothing like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this shoe three different times now and each time I am sent a shoe that looks nothing like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. This was the last pair in the ...
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of these shoes. Super comfortable. This was the last pair in the size and color I wanted. Fast shipping- great service.
customer_reviews.author: Tara L. Clardy-Jones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have had these sneakers for a few weeks and the soles are already falling apart with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in ahoe
customer_reviews.text: The lining in the left shoe was doubled over at the toe and stuck to itself instead of stuck to the bottom of the shoe. I was able to pull it apart but it created a crease that is a little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: deanne king

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! Fit right away, I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Fit perfectly and get me through 12 hour shifts on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Got them for a trip to Disney World and they were incredibly comfortable. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Maines

customer_reviews.title: Best that i revive
customer_reviews.text: It's the best it's comfortable and the lace don't drop so often😊 been wearing it to school since I revive it it's so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Ong

customer_reviews.title: It's so comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: More than five star! It's so comfortable and stylish. Good price/true size . The under armor makes good stuff 👍🏻 I might buy different color. I purchased black and gray.
customer_reviews.author: Meiyu Song

customer_reviews.title: Great and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I needed a pair of lightweight sneakers for a trip to Europe, but I wanted something that also lended some support. I wore these all around London and Paris, I even climbed the first two levels of the Eiffel Tower in them and my feet and legs felt great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bachmann

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but way to small. I have always worn an 11 in UA, guess I can't go by that anymore.
customer_reviews.author: K.Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Love them . Very comfortable love the way the look.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Just needed some wearing.
customer_reviews.text: While the shoes were a tad tight on the too of my foot when first putting them on, i still had enough room in the toes and they just needed to be worn for a few days to break them in. Beautiful pair if shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These run small and they're a bit narrow. I am a true size 8 and my toes hit the top of the shoe, plus they are tight across the arch.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very little break in time...wore them 12 days straight on a trip to Spain with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the most comfortable shoes I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable shoes I've ever had. Fit perfectly!! I'm on my feet all day and i love that when I come home my feet aren't hurting so bad like they were with my other shoes. Very light weight and breathable. I recommend the under armor socks as well.
customer_reviews.author: savannah wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great quality, and true to size. I LOVE the color, London orange.
customer_reviews.author: Destanie Weeks

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Micro G Fuel Running Shoes Cross-Country
product_meta.description: Lightweight mesh upper delivers complete breathability . Hidden, built-in midfoot straps provide locked-in fit & support without adding extra bulk. EVA sockliner for added underfoot comfort. One-piece Micro Gmidsole turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs. Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight . Anatomically placed flex grooves offer extra flexibility where you need it most. Offset: 10 mm. Weight: 8.3 oz.
feature_bullets: Lightweight mesh upper delivers complete breathability
Hidden, built in midfoot straps provide locked in fit & support without adding extra bulk
EVA sockliner for added underfoot comfort
One piece Micro G midsole turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs
Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight
